reviewText: Still the same Directors cut version. Its also the 4:3 pan and scan box version. The added scene where they are crossing the bridge after the garage present day battle where Connors girl gives him the flowers etc is on here. Its so corny. The Directors cut ruined the original version which flowed better and had better editing. They didn't need to add all the unnecessary scenes.

25 minutes in, and so far not one bit different from the original. Not one bit....  If you want to have it simply to have other (versions) of Highlander, great. But not expecting anything to change anytime soon. This version top pic - original DVD release bottom pic.
Good entertainment, but will make more sense if you watch the original "Highlander" first.
just a more edited version of the 1st highlander movie.
I love all things Highlander and it arrived quickly.
